title: Liam Payne gave troubled Justin Bieber his number and told him to call any time to 'chat' about perils of fame
text:
Liam Payne gave troubled Justin Bieber his number and told him to call any time to 'chat' about perils of fame Liam credits his One Direction pals with helping him keep his head Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Liam Payne has reached out to Justin Bieber – offering him his number to "chat" any time. 
Biebs has rarely been out of the headlines during his tour of Australia, where it was recently reported he hand-picked a dozen models to party with during a late-night cruise. 
All of the women were asked to sign a non-disclosure agreement and surrender their phones before boarding his boat. 
Liam said: “He’s a great guy — inside there’s a really good heart. Liam Payne gave Justin Bieber his number (Photo: oamze.com) Is it too late now to say sorry? (Photo: Splash News) 
He told Rollercoaster magazine: “I said, ‘Look, the difference between me and you is I had four different boys going through the same thing to look to. He didn’t have that.’ 
“I said to him, ‘Take my number and any time you want a chat, let me know as I’m here and I understand exactly what you’re going through and I understand your world.’ 
“He needs somebody like that and in that position.” Liam Payne for Rollacoaster Magazine (Photo: Rollacoaster/James White) 
During the same interview, Liam also talked candidly about his girlfriend Cheryl 
When Liam first clocked eyes on her, he was the X Factor wannabe going through his first nail biting audition and she was the glamorous judge with a successful pop career already under her belt. 
With a 10 year age gap, it seemed unlikely that puppy-eyed Liam would ever be on the same level as the nation's sweetheart. 
But now 10 years later, Liam and Cheryl are expecting their first child and are clearly madly in love. 
And now Liam has admitted for the first time that dating his teenage crush is a "dream". Liam Payne and Cheryl (Photo: Getty) 
“This is the thing. In a non-cliché way, it’s weird waking up every day and literally living out your dream. You wake up in the most beautiful places," he said. 
“Obviously I have the most ­beautiful girlfriend in the world and she’s absolutely amazing. She’s been my dream girl since I was younger. She’s so ace.” 
And the 23 year old just couldn't stop gushing about his girlfriend. Liam admitted his teenage crush on Cheryl (Photo: Getty) 
“She is a wonderful, wonderful person and it’s amazing to have someone who can relate to so much of things — someone who’s taken greater steps than me," he contined. 
“Her solo career was ­amazing. She’s been in the ­industry for 14 years now. 
“She fully supports me. We’re super happy. It’s a very personal, precious time for us. I’m still ­learning. I’m only 23.” Like us on Facebook
